name: Run (itch) (Yrgo_Game_Programmer)
description:
Run is a 3D, finite runner set in a minimalist, voxel-based universe. It pits you against the enigmatic Shadow as you try to make your way across platforms of each level as fast as you can.

Run is developed by Team Runtime for a 7 week long school project.  A group formed together for a school project at Yrgo, Gothenburg. The project is part of the Game Production Course within the Game Programming programme.

How To Play

  • WASD or Directional Keys - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Shift - Dash

Credits

Heimer Anhfelt - Programming, Level Design, Music
Simon Ektjärn - Project Lead, Programming, Level Design
Vidar Mårtensson - Programming, Level Design, Audio
Noah Nordqvist - Project Management, Programming, Art Integration

Melinda Pettersson - Digital Designer
Benjamin Vevang - Digital Design Lead

If you have any thoughts or feedback, please comment down below.

Thanks for playing our game!
